## Other Resources 

- [`bayesrules`](https://github.com/mdogucu/bayesrules){target="_blank"} R package to supplement learning with Bayes Rules! book.


- [How Data Nerds Found A 131-Year-Old Sunken Treasure](https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/how-data-nerds-found-a-131-year-old-sunken-treasure/){target="_blank"} is a video by FiveThirtyEight that explains how SS Central America was found using Bayesian methods. 

- [The Learning Bayesian Statistics Podcast](https://www.learnbayesstats.com/){target="_blank"} 


## Editing the List

If you would like to make suggestions to this list, please do so either by creating an issue or a pull request on the [GitHub repo](https://www.github.com/mdogucu/undergrad-bayes){target="_blank"} (prefered) or via email. Please note that this list specifically focuses on _undergraduate_ Bayesian education. If you are making suggestions of a resource, please note how it is appropriate at the _undergraduate level_ if it is not obvious from the title or abstract.
